meta.description: data for offline version of the Esperanto dictionary Reta Vortaro

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v2.0 only

meta.long_description:
PReVo is the "portable" ReVo, i.e., the offline version
of the Esperanto dictionary Reta Vortaro.

This package provides the ReVo database for the prevo command line application.
meta.name: prevo-data
